title: Department of Electrical Engineering/Viva Voce Questions
content: What are types of strain guage?
Why semicondor Strain guage are not used widely ?
1. There G factor won't be same because doping can't be precisely controlled.
What are the typical values for sensitivity for Thermocouple based Temp Sensors?
In the order of microvolts per degree celsius.

decrease the current down to less current using the current transformer then measure

A DC voltage source and a circuit is given. What configuration should be used such that irrespective of the polarity of the battery the circuit should work fine.
Use full wave rectifier circuit configuration using 4 diodes
Difference between Discrete signals and digital signals
Digital can have only 2 states - ON and OFF
GIven a transfer function draw bode plot. Then find its impulse response. Finally draw root locus

Draw the V-I characteristics of a practical diode and write down expressions for calculating its static and dynamic resistance.
At which point on the V-I characteristic curve is the static resistance equal to the dynamic resistance.
Draw the circuit which you would use for measuring the V and I values for plotting the V-I characteristics curve of the practical diode. You are provided with a 5V battery as your voltage source.

You are given a 3.3V Zener diode which is connected with a random signal generator located to its left with a 1k resistance connecting one lead of the signal generator to the cathode of the diode, and anode of the diode is connected directly to the other lead of the signal generator. The signal generator generates discrete time random valued voltage pulses following a normal distribution with mean of 0V and standard deviation of 3 V. That would be the pdf of the signals sensed across the leads of the Zener diode.
When speaking your frequency of signals range in 80-800 Hz and I am sampling your speech at 1kHz, what will I hear if I playback the recorded signal.
Given a transfer function (s+a)/((s+b)*(s+c))..where b>0,c>0 and for case of a>0 and a<0 comment on phase margin,stability

He said it can't be used

with a recursive equation of output

Hardware, Software and priority interrupt controller use

trace = sum of eigenvalues ; det = prdct of eigenvalues

feed in sine wave by signal generator and see response

we answered 100Hz, he said think on this! :P
